title: Chintz Border, 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for 2 reds and 2 purples applied by pen and brush. Madder dyed. Blue applied in two strengths by brush (chintz).
description: Part of a border with an essentially symmetrical arrangement of plants and scrolls on right side of a tree.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chintz Border, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for 2 reds and 2 purples applied by pen and brush. Madder dyed. Blue applied in two strengths by brush (chintz).. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-75.
